tooltips.reply:
Notify email senders that their emails has been received.

 Only one email will be sent to a particular recipient during some period of time to prevent looping.
tooltips.createCase: Automatically create case from incoming emails.
tooltips.replyToAddress: Specify email address of this mailbox to make responses come here.
tooltips.caseDistribution: How cases will be assigned to. Assigned directly to the user or among the team.
tooltips.assignToUser: User emails/cases will be assigned to.
tooltips.team: Team emails/cases will be related to.
tooltips.targetUserPosition: Define the position of users which will be destributed with cases.

messages.couldNotConnectToImap: No se pudo conectar con el servidor IMAP
